channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1534026064229552128
item.description: 🧵 #COVID19mx Pues los datos abiertos de hoy solo agregaron 1 día más de datos a lo que compartí desde el sábado, así que la interpretación es la misma: el número promedio de nuevos casos confirmados por día se ha triplicado en el último mes... https://t.co/ZlxiTVfHH5 https://t.co/6E3xYQoxFb

item.title: #en @ 1533985093362110464
item.description: Using the example of mobile networks in Ecuador, @BryanRVallejo shows how to find, analyze, and visualize open data from mobile operators around the world. https://t.co/eoZ209wmrr

item.title: #es @ 1533978692120203267
item.description: Y mientras uno aquí esperando a que liberen los datos abiertos de hoy 🙄 ... https://t.co/qdyTAypsg5

item.title: #en @ 1533976320052498432
item.description: If I see a resume with preprints, and the preprints have open data, and you have a GitHub page, I will hire you 10/10 over someone with an equivalent resume or even 'fancier' papers. I don't give a hot buttered fuck where you published. Show me HOW you published. https://t.co/B9W8KlIysG

item.title: #en @ 1533952268537667585
item.description:
We took essential services away from the most vulnerable in society in order to assuage the suddenly-hypochondriac upper-middle class in developed nations, undoing years of progress in the process.
I treated this as a generational failure, because it was. https://t.co/Wsgp9nHXuw

item.title: #en @ 1533892750025818112
item.description: Open data is key to advocating for change. Looking at traffic volume/speed data for a street I want to advocate for a road diet on, the data clearly shows there's a huge speeding problem (this street has a 40 MPH speed limit). While most drivers speed, look at how many are 70+😲 https://t.co/U7DhG1S3OK

item.title: #en @ 1533885183061114880
item.description:
The @ASMicrobiology #MicrobiomeData Prize recognizes #microbiome researchers for their contribution to #OpenData, #DataStandards, and #DataWorkflow best practices.
Apply by 06/20 if you work on making #MicrobiomeScience more collaborative ➡️ https://t.co/2SHn7fnrZR

item.title: #th @ 1533815508654759938
item.description:
ถ้าสิ่งนี้ คือ การ PR ก็ถือว่าเยี่ยมมากกกกก นึกไม่ถึงว่า อาจารย์ชัชชาติจะไปสเกลนี้เลย
Open data คือจะทำอะไร นโยบายอะไร ประมูลงานอย่างไร ขึ้น cloud data หมด
คือที่ตามดู live เนี่ย รู้สึกตามแล้วฉลาดขึ้น เปิดโลก สุขภาพจิตดีขึ้น
👇 https://t.co/XNi2wXNAcn
#ผู้ว่าฯกทม #ชัชชาติ https://t.co/U0bRj8mDWX

item.title: #en @ 1533814294478921729
item.description: 🌎Hi #GIS world it's #MapMonday at @Soar_Earth 🚀 Fuzhou, #China 🇨🇳 - Intensive #urbanization 🟢1966 HighRes Color 🕵️‍♂️Spy #Satellite @USGS Declassified KH-7 InfraRed 👀➡️https://t.co/ScNK3x3DlN Share your maps 🗺️, compare dates, annotate, +..! #OSINT #OpenData #Environment https://t.co/BvkQ5JWnYj

item.description: ทั่นผู้ว่าฯ และทีมงานเขาไปยัน open data แล้ว ข้าราชการทั้งหลายกรุณาเลิกใช้ Fax หันมาใช้ E-mail และทำงานทันทีโดยไม่ต้องรอหนังสือฉบับจริงด้วยนะ ไหว้ล่ะ 😑 #ผู้ว่าฯกทม

item.title: #th @ 1533781355393581056
item.description:
ตอนนี้ #ชัชชาติ ประชุมกับเอกชน อาสา เรื่องการนำ open data ของรัฐและจากประชาชนมาแชร์กันเพื่อดีเทคต์ปัญหาและแก้ไขปัญหา อย่างเช่นอุบัติเหตุ โชว์ในแมปมีจุดแดงขึ้นแต่ละเขตเลย นี่ก็ว่าล้ำแล้วนะ
ชัชชาติถามว่าจุดแดงนี่ตายในที่เกิดเหตุหรือตายโรงบาล
ล้ำไปอีก!

item.title: #th @ 1533780613232472064
item.description:
ไลฟ์ Open Data ที่เพจ #ชัชชาติ ตอนนี้ ถ้าใครว่างควรเข้าไปฟังจริงๆนะ เป็นการเปิดโอกาสให้คนที่มีทักษะ ความสามารถ ศักยภาพเข้ามาเป็นส่วนหนึ่งของการพัฒนาเมืองอย่างยั่งยืน
ปล.ไอเดียนี้มีทำมาก่อนนะใช่ แต่ทำมาแล้ว มันเกิดและมันดีไหม นั่นคือคถ. สลิ่มอย่างดิ้นมากขอร้อง รำคาญ #ผู้ว่าฯกทม

item.title: #en @ 1533574031865257989
item.description:
The faster we erase centralized data ownership, the better.
We need MORE #Web3 builders with a passion to build an #OpenData economy.
Stop giving your data away only to be used against you and sold to the highest bidder.
#Data is power. #DataUnions support it.

item.title: #en @ 1533510428352978944
item.description: The other advantage of this model is what's known as "linked open data". Wikidata items can be linked to external databases, e.g. Irish places are linked to their entries in the @logainm_ie database, Irish writers are linked to @ainm_ie, and so on.

item.title: #en @ 1533495687681298434
item.description: And if monastic life sounds appealing but coding isn’t your thing at all, you could be updating Wikipedia, scanning and indexing ancient books, or doing open-data research on pressing topics. Monasteries we’re keepers of wisdom and knowledge for as long as they exist.

item.title: #en @ 1533086698619518976
item.description:
We are grateful for the fast #opendata sharing by @CDCgov & @CrystalGigante et al to @NCBI - & also the many other labs worldwide who have shared sequences openly, in the past & recently.
Without such sharing, none of these analyses would be possible, nor so accessible.🙏🏻
5/6

item.title: #en @ 1533086683746426882
item.description:
We have updated our #monkeypox build to include the latest #opendata sequences from @CDCgov from Maryland, Texas, Virginia, & Florida.
These sequences fall outside where most of the recent sequences cluster (blue).
https://t.co/bh2zC7thbP
1/6
https://t.co/oQgwOQnZVh https://t.co/unqbxOvwsJ

item.title: #en @ 1533082184709509121
item.description: This describes a huge CC0 #opendata release in @GBIF linked to 80,000 specimens of 370 species of sand flies. A collection going back to 1953 from 20 different countries in the Americas and all 27 states of Brazil. https://t.co/jitPUDWpoq https://t.co/usj8UJu60L

item.title: #pt @ 1533081763244908544
item.description:
Mais sobre a audiência pública do TSE de quinta e sexta: o @mateus_bvargas fez um bom resumo das posições sobre a aplicação da LGPD nos dados eleitorais. Defendemos a manutenção e a evolução dos dados abertos, inclusive por API +
https://t.co/PwP08kHP6H

item.title: #en @ 1533077901876379651
item.description: I wish Maine had even 1/8th of the amount of public open data (especially around housing) that NYC has. https://t.co/LjbJ8bm54F

item.title: #en @ 1533076304832208897
item.description: As well as the quick sharing of these sequences, we only have the larger picture thanks to the fact that *so many* labs around the world have also shared #opendata quickly & freely - both recently & over the last few years. That is what makes analyses like these possible!

item.title: #en @ 1533073933121069059
item.description:
The four new #monkeypox sequences from Florida, Texas, Virginia, & Maryland (across 2021-2022) are now live at @nextstrain. Really grateful to @CDCgov's fast #opendata sharing, which allows us to integrate these easily & quickly for others to view.
https://t.co/6WCphWopy5 https://t.co/3QB2dxhQuM https://t.co/HyYwe07gXk

item.title: #en @ 1532965372944580609
item.description:
Interesting websites to find data for your next project: 🔥 Crime Data -murderdata .org/ 🔥 NYC Data - opendata.cityofnewyork .us/ 🔥 NASA Data - data.nasa .gov/browse 🔥 WHO Covid Data - covid19.who .int/data 🔥 Yelp Data - www.yelp .com/dataset
Tutorial for each dropping soon!

item.title: #en @ 1532890305791410177
item.description: #OTD 5 years ago I began digitizing Benjamin Franklin's postal ledgers for the @AmPhilSociety nascent Open Data Initiative. Attending #APSOpenData2022 was a full circle moment. Glad to see the work I did to build & develop the ODI (over the 4 years following this photo) mattered. https://t.co/EJ424OGBtC

item.title: #th @ 1532868532215554048
item.description:

item.title: #fr @ 1532861779323256834
item.description: On pleure sur l'opendata de @meteofrance. Pendant ce temps, le massacre continue en Ukraine. Je sais de quoi je parle, j'ai 5 réfugiés à la maison. Et je n'ose évoquer les Syriens ou des autres peuples vivant dans le conflit permanent. On a des problèmes de gosses de riches.

item.title: #pt @ 1532842793718136835
item.description:
Junto com um monte de feras, vou buscar entender e falar sobre a cidade por meio dos dados, fortificando a cultura de dados abertos na cidade.
(Já convido todo mundo a seguir nosso perfil nesta rede social, para não perder nada: @dados_rio.)

item.description: Mi verrebbe voglia di pubblicare la visura camerale e il report dettagliato dell’ultimo anno dell’azienda di Orlowsky, giusto per far capire quanto sia sovradimensionato sui social rispetto al suo reale peso. D’altra parte sono dati pubblici. Ma non succhio cazzi e kinder bueno.
